MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Station View, Whitlow Avenue and surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on site on an underground cable fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10;48AM on 1st March 2021
